output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
climate_data <- read_csv("../datasets/climate_monthly.csv")

climate_data %>% 
  filter(Source == "GISTEMP") %>% 
  mutate(year = year(Date),
         month = month(Date))

Gistemp <- climate_data %>% 
  filter(Source == "GISTEMP") %>% 
  mutate(year = year(Date),
         month = month(Date)) %>%
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarise(Mean = mean(Mean))

ggplot(Gistemp, aes(year, Mean)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  labs(title = "The mean temperature each year in Gistemp", subtitle ="Year: 1880-2016", x = "year", y = "mean temperature")

```
